channel.title: Server offline =/
channel.description: I am aiming to get my private server up and running, I have got the source downloaded everything needed. I have portforwarded. I have done no-ip.com and downloaded the DUC for my computer etc etc... But, when I turn my server online I can get online, but when I go to put it on the server status it says offline. I have also asked others to come on my server but they tried to no avail. Can anyone please help me!

Can you tell me the rule maybe that would help!
